name: places/ChIJVWhVnRNawokRLXRIb-9dOIs
formattedAddress: 1 State St, New York, NY 10004, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1 State St, New York, NY 10004, USA

originalText.text:
Just beware of the lack of delivery, timelines and communication. We secured (paid in full) DBC in December 2022 for a 6 week project. We  had a kickoff meeting on January 4th. From the onset, we had to ask for delivery dates and updates. After the project stalling, we had a meeting on March 3rd with the owner Carlos who informed us that he had to fire his Creative Director, which delayed the project. He assured that he would personally see this to the finish line within a two week timeframe. Thirteen weeks into a six week project, Carlos asked if I could prioritize what I need. Reluctantly, I did. He was to deliver the priority work by that weekend. It’s now an additional four weeks later (17 Weeks) and Carlos and Laine have not delivered or provided an update. We were even informed that Carlos was not available due to a business related obligation as if this isn’t a business obligation. We now have to involve attorneys to address this issue. I really wanted this to work.

UPDATE: We were provided deliverables that were draft level at best.
